import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Modal, Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap'; export const Services = ()=> { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [serviceDescription, setServiceDescription] = useState(''); const handleServiceClick = (description) => { setServiceDescription(description); setShowModal(true); } return (

Core Services

 setShowModal(false)} centered> Service Description {serviceDescription} ); } export default Services;
